books.title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
books.author: Yuval Noah Harari
books.description: Sapiens explores the history of humankind, from the Stone Age to the modern age, offering a thought-provoking look at our species’ evolution and impact on the world.

books.title: Dune
books.author: Frank Herbert
books.description: Set in a distant future amidst a huge interstellar empire, Dune tells the story of a young Paul Atreides, whose family takes control of the desert planet Arrakis, the source of a valuable spice.

books.title: Atomic Habits
books.author: James Clear
books.description: A guide to building good habits and breaking bad ones, focusing on small, actionable changes that lead to remarkable results over time.

books.title: Educated
books.author: Tara Westover
books.description: A powerful memoir of a young woman who grew up in a strict and abusive household in rural Idaho and later pursued an education that transformed her life.

books.title: The Midnight Library
books.author: Matt Haig
books.description: Nora Seed finds herself in a library between life and death, where each book represents a different life she could have lived.

books.title: Where the Crawdads Sing
books.author: Delia Owens
books.description: A coming-of-age story set in the marshes of North Carolina, blending a murder mystery with themes of loneliness and resilience.

books.title: Le Petit Prince
books.author: Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
books.description: Une œuvre intemporelle qui raconte la rencontre entre un aviateur perdu dans le désert et un petit prince venu d'une autre planète.

books.title: Harry Potter à l'école des sorciers
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Le premier tome de la célèbre saga de Harry Potter, un jeune garçon qui découvre qu'il est un sorcier et part étudier à Poudlard.

books.title: L'Étranger
books.author: Albert Camus
books.description: Un chef-d'œuvre de la littérature qui explore l'absurde à travers le regard de Meursault, un homme détaché des conventions sociales.
